snippet: Tigers slugger Miguel Cabrera, who’s been nursing an abdominal injury and took two foul balls off his leg Friday, has hit two homers and driven in four runs in his past two games.
abstract: Detroit Tigers slugger Miguel Cabrera, who has been nursing an abdominal injury and took two foul balls off his leg during game against New York Yankees, has hit two homers and driven in four runs in his past two games.
lead_paragraph: Tigers slugger Miguel Cabrera, who’s been nursing an abdominal injury and took two foul balls off his leg Friday, has hit two homers and driven in four runs in his past two games.

headline.main: Cabrera, Feeling the Wear and Tear, Is Always Bright-Eyed When It Counts
headline.print_headline: Cabrera, Feeling the Wear and Tear, Is Always Bright-Eyed When It Counts
